ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful to G. Bazzi and G. Assandri for their invaluable assistance in graphics and data analysis and to R. Garavaglia, R. Gentili, and A. Losa for their help during sampling activities. This work was partially supported by Regione Lombardia in the framework of the Project “Food Social Sensor Network - Call Accordi per la Ricerca e l’Innovazione” co-funded by the Italian Government action “POR FESR 2014–2020”.
